antigravityStatus.description: Monitor Antigravity AI quota usage in the status bar
antigravityStatus.commands.refresh.title: Refresh Quota
antigravityStatus.configuration.title: Antigravity Status
antigravityStatus.configuration.refreshI: Interval in seconds to refresh quota data (30-3600).
antigravityStatus.configuration.showNoti: Show notification when quota remains below the notification threshold.
antigravityStatus.configuration.notifica: Threshold percentage for sending notifications (1-100). Defaults to 30%.
antigravityStatus.configuration.statusBa: The alignment of the status bar item (left or right).
antigravityStatus.configuration.hiddenMo: List of model IDs to hide from the status bar.
antigravityStatus.configuration.language: The display language for the extension UI. 'Auto' follows the system setting.
